name: Zuzalu Values/Beta Manifesto Workshop
description:
Bring your laptops! We will separate into small groups to create multiple potential answers to the questions below. We can then post 4-6 answers as options to vote on for a zupoll for each question:

1. What are Zuzalu's top three core values?

2. What is a one to three sentence definition of Zuzalu that resonates with you?

3. How can Zuzalu best help the world?

4. How can Zuzaluans best support one another?

5. What is a one to three sentence mission statement for Zuzalu that resonates with you?

6. What is the best way for residents/members to be chosen?

7. What is the best way for organizers to be chosen?

8. What behaviors would lead you to want to exclude a person from the Zuzalu community?

9. What is the best process for kicking a person out of an in-person event?

10. What is the best way for Zuzalu to empower inclusion?

11. Optional: What question do you wish this survey included? 


The questions will be answered on this google form: https://forms.gle/RXRs2FwrkoEG4cAk8
